info.name: Gemstone/Mineral Tumblr Post Icons
info.description: These transparent gemstone tumblr post icons come in three shapes: triangular, rounded rectangle, and square, and have a simple lifting animation. This first set is opals, second is bismuth, third is lapis lazuli, fourth is rose quartz, and fifth is tourmaline. If you want a particular mineral added to this set, have a question, etc., contact me @eatyourheirs. I'm happy to make more.
info.additionalInfo: Check out my gemstone dash theme, it goes great with these. Update: 11/14 - Added Bismuth! 11/22 - Lapis Lazuli, Rose Quartz & Tourmaline.

data.title: You copied my code without my permission
